data.title: Sportspeople: Jobs
data.meta_description: Jobs in sports, fitness, recreation, aquatics, coaching, venues, events, leisure And more.View all our vacancies now with New jobs added daily!
data.text:
The Public Relations Executive plays a crucial role in coordinating day-to-day media relations for a range of our national and state sport clients as well as major events, and also responsible for building relationships with key media contacts, and developing written and social media content.

The Digital Media & Marketing Executive is an integral member of the Beyond the Break Consulting team, joining a small team as part of the boutique sports agency. A focus on the development and execution of our clients’ strategic marketing and digital media activities designed to drive brand presence, customer engagement and digital footprint.

APS Sport seeks the services of a dynamic person to join the management team of our Association. This is a full-time position and the role includes responsibility for various duties related to APS School Sport and office administration including Primary Sport, Fixturing & Results and the Representative programs.

The Senior Bookkeeper & Administration Assistant will support and report directly to the CEO, managing various financial and administrative tasks to ensure the smooth operation of Water Polo Queensland. 3-4 days per week - flexible.

Would you enjoy being part of the Fitness Training Team at Waves Fitness and Aquatic Centre in the Hills? The award-winning complex includes a 10-lane 50m outdoor Olympic-sized pool, additional 25m outdoor pool and two indoor learn to swim and leisure pools, and a fully equipped fitness centre.

Dive into a new role at Waves Fitness and Aquatic Centre! The award-winning complex includes a 10-lane 50m outdoor Olympic-sized pool, additional 25m outdoor pool and two indoor learn to swim and leisure pools, and a fully equipped fitness centre.

Hockey Tasmania (HT) is the State sporting organisation responsible for the development, coordination and promotion of hockey in Tasmania. This position is primarily responsible for the strategic coordination and delivery of state-wide pathways and development programs in Tasmania, working directly with schools, clubs, and other associations.

Use your passion for sport to oversee daily operations, come join us to take your career to the next step!

You will be responsible for supporting the Head Coach in managing and coaching the NSW Swifts as well as preparing individual players both on and off the court for the SSN competition; with additional focus and responsibility on the training partners.

Capital Football is the governing body for Football, including futsal, in the ACT and surrounding regions and is a member of Football Australia. Capital Football operates within a flexible team-based environment. There is an emphasis on multi-skilling and mutual support to allow staff to effectively achieve operational objectives.

Pakenham Basketball Association is seeking a dynamic and experienced General Manager to lead our basketball Association into its next chapter of success. A successful basketball association is one that is serving the Cardinia Shire community at all levels on and off the court

This is a unique opportunity to lead a national high-profile charity! Deliver the Family of League mission and change the lives of those within the rugby league community who have contributed to the game

Lead our video analysis and performance team, play a crucial role in enhancing player and team performance through cutting-edge video technology and analysis techniques. Your insights will support coaching strategies, game preparation, and post-match reviews, ensuring that our club remains at the forefront of rugby union performance analysis.

This is your opportunity to work within an award winning swim school, local government, staff receive ongoing training, support, opportunity to work at three centres working within a structured program.

The new Regional Tennis Development Manager role, part of the Sport Development Team, is crucial for driving tennis growth. This role enhances the strategic and operational capabilities of Regional Tennis Organizations (RTOs), supporting the sport's development at every level.

The Coach Development Manager, part of the Sport Development team, leads Regional Coach Development, driving national strategies in coach development and engagement. The role involves managing courses, workshops, and conferences, ensuring high-quality coaching to meet the needs of participants and athletes at all levels.

Join Basketball Victoria as our State Development Coach Metro and help shape the future of basketball in our state! This is an exciting opportunity to lead and advance our player, coach, and official development programs while promoting the sport of basketball

Are you a dedicated and experienced coach with a passion for developing basketball talent? Basketball Victoria is seeking a motivated individual to join us as a State Development Coach Country

Support the Noosa Leisure Centre Coordinator with the provision of a well-planned and operated leisure facility undertaking a range of duties including but not limited to the provision of cleaning and maintenance duties and front of house duties.

Kickstart your career with TAFE Queensland’s and apply now to join our Academy of Sport Team. Promote & contribute to the sports you love. Opportunities exist in a number of specialised fields. Train in an industry setting with real life integrated learning

Kickstart your career with TAFE Queensland’s and apply now to join our Academy of Sport Team. Deliver training within tier 1 sporting organisations. Plan and deliver leadership and coaching programs. Develop the sporting industry future leaders.

The position holder requires to develop the Club's training programmes so that the RHKYC is seen as a centre of excellence in Asia for yacht training.

The Sydney FC Academy is widely recognised as one of the most successful and innovative youth academies in Australia. We are seeking a qualified, experienced and driven strength and conditioning coach to drive high performance culture and initiatives in our Junior Academy (U13-16s).

Our ideal candidate will have a positive attitude, experience in a recreational/sporting environment, computer and point of sale experience in a variety of payments and have (or able to obtain) Responsible Service of Alcohol (RSA) Certificate.

The Sydney FC Academy is widely recognised as one of the most successful and innovative youth academies in Australia. We are seeking experienced, motivated and talented coaches to take the lead in developing our next generation of talent.

Jungle Sports is one of WA’s most popular children’s multi-sports programs, we teach children aged 18 mths to 6 years for our term time classes and up to 12 years for parties & events. We introduce children to the fun and excitement of the most popular sports whilst helping them develop coordination, encourage social skills and increase confidence.

The National Integrity Manager will be responsible for embedding the National Integrity Framework and other National Sporting Organisation (Australian Dragon Boat Federation) policies into all levels of the sport to ensure participants have confidence that they are participating in a safe, clean, inclusive, and fair sport.

The Brisbane Metro Competition Coordinator role will work closely with WPQ employees to ensure the effective coordination, planning, management, delivery, and oversight of all aspects of the Brisbane Metro Junior Competition acting as the primary point of contact on competition days/evenings.

We are seeking a dynamic and innovative individual to take on the dual role of Marketing & Communication Coordinator and Basketball Development Manager. This unique position will prioritise leading our marketing efforts to enhance brand visibility and community engagement while supporting the ongoing growth of our basketball programs.

With three locations in Melbourne’s east, a range of Learn to Swim & Schools Programs; and plenty of options to work the hours that suit you... Just Swimming can offer you a rewarding career!

Boronia Penguins Swim Team are looking for a Head Coach (Dev. Certified or above) to lead the current coaching squad. We are also looking for one more junior assistant coach to join our growing team

The role includes maintaining the highest quality of catering service, providing a safe, clean and enjoyable experience for all visitors; and, maintaining all usage and storage of kitchen and servery equipment.

We are not your usual, we are upbeat, resourceful and determined. Our staff and community are at the core of what we do, looking for ways to work together and support each other. Be a part of it, let’s get something started.

We’re looking for a Supervisor / Senior Lifeguard to join our professional lifeguard team at Manly Andrew Boy Charlton Aquatic Centre. You’ll bring drive and positivity to a team passionate about making a difference to our community. You will be willing to work open, close or weekend shifts as part of your core work hours.

Meriden welcomes applicants for the position of Southend Tennis - Senior Coach and Centre Manager. This role will be responsible for the delivery of an exceptional tennis experience for Meriden Students, their families and members of the public. This is a permanent full-time position.

Barker College is seeking to appoint a suitably qualified coach to our Volleyball program. The successful candidate will be required to work two mornings or afternoons per week, several hours on Saturdays and participate in our school holiday intensive clinics. Minimum $36 per hour.

Looking for a new challenge? Lead a committed, dedicated and passionate swim team. Join a not for profit swim school with over 100 years as Victoria's leading swim clubs

The Sydney FC Academy is widely recognised as one of the most successful and innovative youth academies in Australia. This newly-created role is an opportunity for a highly-motivated individual to join our team at Sky Park, our new centre of excellence in Macquarie Park as the Technical Lead for our Junior Academy (U13-16) staff and players.

This is a wonderful opportunity to develop an enthusiastic and diverse group of club members while fostering enjoyment for our great sport. The role involves coordination of training sessions, technical coaching of on and off water training, and most importantly maintaining a welcoming and fun environment that meets athletes’ goals.

With continued industry growth, we are seeking an exceptional course and assessment coordinator, which involves coordinating logistics, managing communications and ensuring a seamless experience of participants both nationally and internationally and coordinating the assessment processes pre and post course attendance for the Level 1 ASCA Course.

The Northern Futures Football Program Manager is a full-time position providing the effective coordination of the Northern Futures Football Program. This program, in partnership with the internationally renowned Celtic Soccer Academy, will see you work in community to increase footballing opportunities for all Territorians.

South Fremantle Football Club is seeking a Strength and Conditioning Coach to join the High-Performance Team, responsible for our Rogers Cup program. The Rogers Cup is for players aged under 19 and serves as a crucial pathway for developing talent in Australian rules football.

The Australian Flying Disc Association (AFDA) Limited is recognised as the national sporting organisation responsible for flying disc sports (particularly Ultimate Frisbee and Disc Golf) in Australia. Based at the AFDA Office (Melbourne), and/or work from home within Australia.

The successful applicants will be responsible for delivering swimming lessons for the Craigie Leisure Centre Learn to Swim program and providing a high level of customer service to our swim students and customers. If you are an energetic team player with swimming instruction experience, then this is the role for you.

Coaches must be available from 3.45pm-7.00pm for training at the College. Then also availability for evening games either Tuesday or Wednesday evening (6.30pm onwards) or Saturday mornings between 8am-11am.

The Sydney Swans are accepting applications for the position of Academy Coaching & Talent Director to lead and oversee the technical direction of the QBE Sydney Swans Academy in coaching and talent identification.

We’re looking for adaptable individuals to join our dynamic team. You’ll bring positivity and be self-motivated to join a team that is passionate about making a difference to our community.

Expressions of Interest are invited from experienced Sports Coaches (casual) for our Summer Sports Programme at our Corio Campus in Geelong.

The Learn to Swim Victoria (LTSV) Swim Instructor is responsible in planning and delivering high quality swim lessons in a safe, fun and effective manner. Swim Instructors should have a complete knowledge and understanding of all aspects of teaching swimming and ensuring that safety and enjoyment is within their classes.

In this role, you will be responsible for planning and coordinating Association competitions in alignment with relevant Competition Administration.

Fantastic opportunity for an ambitious sports administrator to join a National Sporting Organisation as it makes its Olympic debut at LA 2028!

Are you ready to make big moves in your career journey? As our Pathways & Member Experience Manager, you’ll be the go-to person for everything competition-related. You’ll manage the nuts and bolts of our junior and senior competitions, ensuring everything runs as smoothly as the perfect free throw.

The Cruising Yacht Club of Australia is in a unique position to recruit the services of an experienced Sport/Sailing Administration Supervisor, due to the incumbent focusing fulltime on her physical and active sailing career. This position is key in providing professional support to the broader sailing team and reports to the Sailing Manager.

Have you ever thought about coaching gymnastics? Do you love working with children? Like keeping active? Have a fun bubbly personality and a can-do attitude, we would love to hear from you! We pay our coaches on average $22 P/H depending on age and experience and the best thing is you don't have to be qualified to get started!

Joining the Hawthorn Football Club represents a unique opportunity to work in a fast paced, elite sporting environment where you can be yourself and thrive. We are currently recruiting customer focused, casual membership consultants.

Do you have a passion for planning and delivering the day-to-day operations and logistics for a major event, with a genuine interest in sport

State Executive Officer position, providing high level administration & support to the peak governing body of Polocrosse in NSW. As the position requires the successful applicant to work from home (remotely), advanced time-management, initiative & ability to complete multiple tasks with varying priorities are crucial to the role.

Geelong United Basketball are looking for coaches to facilitate their community-based programs. These include but are not limited to sporting schools, walking basketball, B-All-In, Social Ladies and All-Abilities.

The Table Tennis Australia Head of Strategic Projects and Commercial is a newly created role to assist the CEO with project managing key strategic pieces of work and developing and implementing a commercialisation strategy across system monetisation, partnerships, sponsors and philanthropic donors.

Careers at the St Kilda Football Club represent a unique opportunity to work in a dynamic, fast-paced team! We are seeking energetic and determined full time Consumer Sales Representatives (fixed-term, 8 months) to join our broader Consumer Team dedicated to providing best in class service and support to our new and existing membership base.
